views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 and 10

Add a different image to each SpringBoard Screen! If you use the right images you can create a Panorama Background Effect that Apple removed from the iPhone. Configure options on settings - supports up to 7 screens!

This tweak will not work if you use a dynamic or live wallpaper

If your images do not show, try setting your wallpaper to a stock wallpaper in Settings->Wallpapers->Stills. Then set your images and respring.

Configure options from Settings

Follow me on twitter @sst1337

Watch it on youtube:

Support of iPhone 7


Choose pictures from Photo Albums
Icon fix


Fixed Preferences Icon Glitch
Fixed LS & HS Glitch


- iOS 9 Support
- Fixed crashes, supports Barrel and Cylinder now.
